title: Chuột Yêu Gạo (English Ver)
lyrics: 1. When that day I hear your voice I have some special feeling Let me always think I don't wanna forget you. I remember at the day You are always on my mind Even- though I just can think about you. 2. If the day in the future This love will becoming true I've never change my mind that I will Love you forever. I don't care how fool it is I will let my dream come true I will tell you something I wanna Let you know, I let you know. Chorus: I love you, loving you As the mouse love the rice Even every day has storm I will always by your side. I miss you, missing you I don't care how hard it is I just want you be happy Every- thing, I do it for you 1. Koh ma uo yo daht eul deut keu dae yeop peh iss ki eh Duh neun nae il ri na doo ryup ji ahn jyo. Sa rang ddeh meh him deun kuhn ih byul ddae meh appeun kuhn Young hwa sok eh man iss suht seu myon hae. 2. Uhn jeh na nan miht uht jyo nae ban jjok keu dae ra koh Nuh moo na ik sook hae soh neul bool ahn haet suht duhn na reul. Nuh moo na haeng bok hae suh man ni ool ruht duhn na reul Mal ups shi ah na joo uht jyo ih jeh neun ah na juo. Boh yeoh yo keu dae man al ra boh ki man hae doh Sarang hae yo sarang hae yo mal loh neun xda moht han man keum. Ah ra oh keu dae mam ah moo mal doh ahn nae doh Sarang hae sarang hae yo noon mool reul ih kil man keum sarang hae yo. I love you, loving you As the mouse love the rice Sarang hae yo sarang hae yo Mal loh neun xda moht han man keum. I miss you, missing you I don't care how hard it is Sarang hae sarang hae yo Noon mool reul ih kil man keum Sarang hae yo.
